      • untrack

        public void untrack​(Entity entityIn)
        Removes the given entity, sending removal packets to all players tracking it. Called when the entity is dead.
        参数:
        entityIn - The entity to untrack

      • tick

        public void tick()

        public void updateVisibility​(EntityPlayerMP player)

      • getTrackingPlayers

        public java.util.Set<? extends EntityPlayer> getTrackingPlayers​(Entity entity)
        Get all players tracking the given Entity. The Entity must be part of the World that this Tracker belongs to.
        参数:
        entity - the Entity
        返回:
        all players tracking the Entity

      • sendToTrackingAndSelf

        public void sendToTrackingAndSelf​(Entity entityIn,
                                  Packet<?> packetIn)

      • removePlayerFromTrackers

        public void removePlayerFromTrackers​(EntityPlayerMP player)

      • sendLeashedEntitiesInChunk

        public void sendLeashedEntitiesInChunk​(EntityPlayerMP player,
                                       Chunk chunkIn)
        Send packets to player for every tracked entity in this chunk that is either leashed to something or someone, or has passengers

      • setViewDistance

        public void setViewDistance​(int distance)
        Sets the view distance used on the server. For the dedicated server, this is the view-distance value in server.properties. For the integrated server, this is the host's render distance (which may change).
        参数:
        distance - Distance to track, in chunks
